This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship.(n)

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs.(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct.(n)

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action highlights this breezy fantasy starring Jesse Bradford as Zak Gibbs, a high school student who "borrows" the latest invention of his scientist dad, a "hyper-time" device that impresses a pretty exchange student (Paula Garces) but also attracts the attention of a sinister government agent (Michael Biehn). French Stewart and Julia Sweeney costar in this teen adventure in the tradition of "Back to the Future.".(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.(n)

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser.(n)

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms.(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.(n)

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with.(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.(n)

programme.title: The Weather Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this comedy-drama as a Chicago weather man whose personal life enters free-fall even as his career is potentially about to take off with a new job on a national television morning show. Michael Caine and Hope Davis costar in this film from director Gore Verbinski ("The Ring," "Pirates of the Caribbean").

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: Welcome to Greenleaf, a picture-perfect Indiana town where the high school is the proud focus of attention. On the night of the Oscars telecast, the town's center of attention is Greenleaf teacher Howard Brackett when a former student, who's now a winning actor, tells the audience of millions that Howard is gay. Kevin Kline plays stunned Howard, who scrambles to go forth with his wedding to devoted Emily (Joan Cusack) and assert his manliness.

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy.

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.

programme.title: My One and Only
programme.desc: After she catches her husband cheating on her, a charming, flamboyant socialite packs her two young sons into a Coupe de Ville and embarks on a cross-country journey to find a new head of the family. Renee Zellweger, Logan Lerman and Kevin Bacon star in this comedy-drama loosely based on a true story.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed.

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby.

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta.

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world.

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: Michael and Joanna Reed (Sam Worthington and Keira Knightley) seem to have it all. Young, attractive and successful, they're a married couple who've lucked into spiritual and material well-being, sharing a comfortable life in their trendy Manhattan apartment. But when they attend one of Michael's work parties, Joanna witnesses a suspicious moment between her husband and his beautiful new co-worker, Laura (Eva Mendes). Joanna can't be sure what she did or didn't see - but it sows a powerful seed of doubt.(n)
Belle resists the notion of a serious relationship with Duncan until Bambi announces that she and former client Byron have become engaged.(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby.(n)

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Kathy (Academy Award® winner Rachel Weisz) is an American police officer who takes a job working as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia. Her expectations of helping to rebuild a devastated country are dashed when she uncovers a dangerous reality of corruption, cover-up and intrigue, amid a world of private contractors and multinational diplomatic doubletalk. Directed by Larysa Kondracki, the film also stars Academy Award® winner Vanessa Redgrave, Monica Bellucci and Academy Award® nominee David Strathairn.(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.(n)

Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with.(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury.(n)

programme.title: Sins of Our Youth
programme.desc: Four teenagers accidentally kill a young boy while firing assault weapons recreationally. In their moment of desperation, paranoia and fear that their lives are over, the youths drunkenly construct a chilling plan reminiscent of a video game plot: they will hunt each other down until only one is left standing. Now, with the clock ticking, each young man must come to terms with their actions and decide how far they are willing to go.(n)

programme.title: When Cary Grant Introduced Timothy Leary to LSD
programme.desc: Cary Grant (BEN CHAPLIN) sits in his plush dressing room at Culver Studios, California, waiting to be called to set by his director, Alfred Hitchcock. Suddenly he gets a visitor, Dr. Timothy Leary (AIDEN GILLEN). Having read about Grant's dabbling with LSD in an interview with Good Housekeeping Magazine, Leary is keen to try the magical new drug. Grant however, is insistent that the powerful substance only be taken under medical supervision. Together, the men explore past, present and future memories.(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.(n)

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

programme.title: Would You Rather
programme.desc: After the tragic death of her parents, Iris (Brittany Snow) is desperate to make ends meet while caring for her terminally ill younger brother. Shepard Lambrick (Jeffrey Combs), a philanthropist who expresses interest in helping them, invites her to an exclusive dinner party. When she arrives, she finds herself among a group of similarly desperate individuals. They are all trapped in Lambrick's mansion and forced to play a sadistic game where only the winner will get out alive.(n)

programme.title: Whitney: Can I Be Me
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.(n)
The first meeting of Duncan and Ben does not go well, leaving Belle facing a dilemma: which man should she choose to keep in her life?(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Strong Sexual Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves.(n)

programme.title: Fight Valley
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring, her sister begins training under a respected ex-fighter to bring justice to the killer.(n)

programme.title: Brimstone
programme.desc: Liz (Dakota Fanning) is full of heart and grit but is being hunted by a vengeful Preacher (Guy Pearce) who is a diabolical zealot. She's a genuine survivor and uses her strength to claim the better life she and her daughter deserve.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with.(n)

programme.title: In a Perfect World...
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments.(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement.(n)

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world.(n)

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).(n)

programme.title: You, Me and Him
programme.desc: Two female lovers, one a career driven lawyer (Lucy Punch), the other a fun-loving, pot-smoking layabout (Faye Marsay), have an annoying Casanova neighbor (David Tennant). While neither woman ever wanted children, both end up pregnant, creating conflicts that cause each to re-examine their outlook on life and their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: The Weather Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this comedy-drama as a Chicago weather man whose personal life enters free-fall even as his career is potentially about to take off with a new job on a national television morning show. Michael Caine and Hope Davis costar in this film from director Gore Verbinski ("The Ring," "Pirates of the Caribbean").(n)

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Based on a novel by playwright Arthur Miller ("Death of a Salesman"), this morality tale stars Laura Dern, William H. Macy and David Paymer in the story of Lawrence Newman, a New York resident who faces anti-Semitism when his purchase of a new pair of spectacles makes him "look Jewish" to his prejudiced neighbors. Meat Loaf Aday costars in this provocative independent drama produced by the Big Apple's mayor, Michael Bloomberg.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Man
programme.desc: Danny Kaye stars as a bookworm forced to impersonate his late twin, a slick entertainer bumped off by hoods. (cc).

programme.title: A Song Is Born
programme.desc: A professor (Danny Kaye) falls in love with a nightclub singer (Virginia Mayo) being chased by both police and hoods. Magenbruch: Benny Goodman. Twingle: Hugh Herbert. Tony Crow: Steve Cochran. Tommy Dorsey, Louis Armstrong, Lionel Hampton. Howard Hawks directed. (cc).

programme.title: The Merry Widow
programme.desc: Silent version of the operetta about an American dancer who is wooed by three different members of European royalty, each of whom covets her for different reasons.

programme.title: Tampopo
programme.desc: Food and sex are the main ingredients in Juzo Otami's "noodle western," a sendup about a widow (Nobuko Miyamoto) in distress and a trucker (Tsutomu Yamazaki) who comes to her rescue. Gangster: Koji Yakusho. Gun: Ken Watanabe. Piskin: Rikiya Yasuoka. Shohei: Kinzo Sakura.

programme.title: The Funeral
programme.desc: Writer-director Juzo Itami toys with tradition when a couple tries to give the family patriarch a Buddhist cremation. Inoue: Tsutomu Yamazaki. Chizuko: Nobuko Miyamoto. Kikue: Kin Sugai. Amamiya: Shuji Otaki. The Priest: Chishu Ryu.

programme.title: Man of the People
programme.desc: An immigrant-lawyer (Joseph Calleia) finds it hard to flee crooked politicians. Florence Rice, Thomas Mitchell. Joe: Ted Healy. Mrs. Read: Catherine Doucet. Stringer: Paul Stanton. Edwin L. Marin directed.

programme.title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Frank Capra's Best Picture nominee about a wide-eyed patriotic bumpkin named Jefferson Smith (James Stewart), who's appointed to the Senate by corrupt politicos, chief among them and unbeknownst to Smith is a senior senator whom he idolized. Stewart was nominated for Best Actor and the film was up for a total of 10 Academy Awards. A TV series of the same name had a one-season run (1962-3). (cc).

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A group of people traveling through Indian country on a stagecoach are pressured by the threat posed by Geronimo and discover which among them can stay cool in a crisis. (cc).

programme.title: The Long Voyage Home
programme.desc: The lives of the crew who live aboard the freighter Glencairn are followed as they drink, womanize, fight and bond, sometimes searching for ways to cure boredom, and sometimes facing life or death situations. (cc).

programme.title: Out of the Fog
programme.desc: A Brooklynite and his neighborhood are extorted by a racketeering gangster, though his upwardly mobile daughter, a 21 year old telephone operator, is charmed by him. (cc).

programme.title: The Horse Soldiers
programme.desc: Leading up to the Siege of Vicksburg, a Union brigade is sent behind enemy lines to blow up a railroad depot to cut off Confederate supplies. Based on actual events. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Arizona
programme.desc: A feisty pioneer woman takes control of an impoverished Arizona outpost. She manages to transform the down-and-out community into the flourishing town of Tuscon, but faces opposition from a con man trying to supplant her. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Escape From Fort Bravo

programme.desc: Adaptation of the Rudyard Kipling adventure about an orphan who becomes a spy for the British in 1880s India, where he undertakes a sojourn with a holy lama on a mysterious quest and gets involved in a plan to rid the Khyber Pass of Czarist Russian agitators. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Bhowani Junction
programme.desc: An Anglo-Indian woman, searching for a sense of identity and community amid the turmoil and upheaval at the time of the English withdrawal, falls in love with a British officer . (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: An office worker loans his tiny New York City flat to his superiors for their secret romantic trysts and is subsequently promoted for maintaining silence about the affairs, but he runs into trouble when he gets involved with his callous boss' girlfriend. An Oscar winner for Best Picture and Director (Billy Wilder). (cc).(n)

programme.title: Two Guys from Milwaukee
programme.desc: A Balkan prince travels to New York and sneaks away from his escort to observe how the ordinary man lives. The prince befriends a cabbie who, with his girlfriend, helps him roam the city incognito. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Man in the Net
programme.desc: When his troublesome, alcoholic wife disappears, a reclusive artist is immediately suspected of doing away with her, and a net of suspicion and circumstantial evidence closes in ever-tightening circles around him.(n)

programme.title: Bright Leaf
programme.desc: After being driven from his spread by an autocratic tobacco tycoon, a tenant farmer returns in triumph with a revolutionary cigarette-making machine and sets about driving the mogul out of business. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Night and Day
programme.desc: Highly fictionalized account of the life of Cole Porter chronicles the period from 1912-46, and takes him from his days at Yale to his hits on the Broadway and London stages and features more than 20 of his musical compositions. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Two best friends who are also neighbors and coworkers have a falling out after one has multimillion-dollar success with a far-fetched consumer product that hits the big time and the other fails to invest in the dubious solvent, leaving him out of money. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Empire
programme.desc: An ambitious South Bronx drug dealer gets in over his head when he becomes involved in an investment scheme with a shady Wall Street banker. He discovers going straight is a more complicated matter than he ever imagined. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: This true-life football saga centers on Vince Papale, a 30-year-old sandlot player who earned a spot on the 1976 Philadelphia Eagles. In time, Papale becomes a special-teams star and fan favorite. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: A biography of Howard Hughes, centering on his glory years from the 1920s to the 1940s. After making a fortune improving the design of oil drilling bits, Hughes becomes the Hollywood mogul behind RKO studios, and devotes his life to aviation. The film also depicts Hughes' romances Hollywood starlets Jean Harlow and Katharine Hepburn. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: In the immediate aftermath of the assassination of President John F. Kennedy, his wife Jacqueline deals with her immense grief while caring for her young family and making plans for his funeral procession. At the same time, a bereaved nation watches on. (cc).(n)

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: This challenging, frantic and clever farce stems from the plight of an environmentalist (Jason Schwartzman) who hires existential detectives to make sense of his life while he battles a department store's dubious intentions. Jude Law. Co-written and directed by David O. Russell. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Practical Magic
programme.desc: Two witches become the target of a detective's investigation after one of their boyfriends goes missing. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Fist Fight
programme.desc: On the last day before summer vacation, a mild-mannered high-school teacher is challenged to a fist fight by a fearsome colleague after he accidentally causes the latter to be fired. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Dude, Where's My Car?
programme.desc: A dimwit (Ashton Kutcher) searches for his missing wheels with the help of his equally lame-brained pal (Seann William Scott) in this meandering comedy. Jennifer Garner and Marla Sokoloff costar as the guys' twin girlfriends. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Two rival corporate spies and former government employees begin a clandestine love affair as they try to outwit and double-cross each other. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Love Liza
programme.desc: Character actor extraordinaire Philip Seymour Hoffman stars as a man grappling with his wife's suicide in this incisive character study written by his brother Gordy. Kathy Bates is memorable as his mother-in-law. Denny: Jack Kehler. Maura: Sarah Koskoff. Bailey: Stephen Tobolowsky. Brenda: Erika Alexander. Bern: J.D. Walsh. Pad: Jimmy Raskin. Jim: Kevin Breznahan. Lynne: Jennifer Keddy. Directed by Todd Louiso. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Nell
programme.desc: A young woman living in an isolated North Carolina cabin is discovered by a small-town doctor, who is fascinated by her and attempts to introduce her to the world. Based on the play "Idioglossia" by Mark Handley. (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A British screenwriter (Ewan McGregor) agrees to ghostwrite the memoirs of a retired prime minister, but after he takes the job the former political leader is accused of committing a war crime. As the writer uncovers facts that corroborate these suspicions, he begins to fear he might be killed, just like the man who worked on the memoirs before him. Directed by Roman Polanski. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: In this slasher film, every boy in a tiny Texas town lusts for stunning high-school honey Mandy, an orphan who has recently moved in with relatives. But someone else crashes the increasingly drunken get-together, with lethal results. (cc).

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: O'S**t tries to bring the mothers of his children together. Sky decides she's ready to have a baby and enlists Ceaser to help. Walt hits rock bottom and must send his kids to live with their mom. (repeat).

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew decides to secretly perform a paternity test on O'S**t's new baby. Ted and Sky go on a date that has a surprising outcome. Donna campaigns to be Bae's doula. Walt works hard to get his kids back home. (repeat).

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Sky pops the question to Eliot. Donna is caught trying to steal Mel's client, but O'S**t commits the ultimate betrayal when he seeks a job with Ceaser's biggest enemy. A woman claims Black Ink gave her an infected tattoo. (repeat).

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Kirk and Jasmine come face to face for the first time in a year. Samantha pushes Tommie to make up with her sister Versace. Karlie finds herself in a new role as caretaker for her sick father. (repeat).

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Stevie stuns his family with a shocking announcement. Mimi and Keely attempt to mediate between Stevie's artists. Karlie encourages Rasheeda to date her hunky new trainer. Dime hears her baby's heartbeat for the first time. (repeat).

programme.title: Teyana & Iman
programme.desc: The Shumperts are among the elite at New York Fashion Week and there isn't a runway that Teyana can't slay. But, when Junie suddenly gets an eye infection, Teyana and Iman pull the plug on the glitz and glamour to put their child first. (repeat).

programme.title: Leave It to Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie refuses to help Dorian launch his rap career so Savannah and Stevie Jr. step in. Stevie gets a culture shock when he tries to woo a French beauty. At K. Michelle's suggestion, Stevie meets with a PR exec. (repeat).

programme.title: Booty Call
programme.desc: Farce revolving around the antics of sex-obsessed friends who are in need of some TLC from their dates.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Brown, Derek and Renee team up to get a photograph of a celebrity's baby; Will finds marijuana and tries to smoke out the owner. (repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Reggie chooses to stay in California, upsetting Cora. Meanwhile, Brown, having more courage than the others, gears up to teach Brianna to drive. (repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: The men are determined to boycott Valentine's Day, but they change their tune when the ladies plan something special. The romantic theme continues when Brown concludes that Renee has a hush-hush crush on him. (repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: The Colonel reconnects with his warfare past when the son of a fellow soldier arrives. Elsewhere, Brown gets a medical checkup. (repeat).

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: Single Sheneneh appears on a dating game show, hoping to make a love connection with guest Chris Rock. Gina: Tisha Campbell. Pam: Tichina Arnold. Tommy: Tommy Ford. (repeat).

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: Gina's birthday bash for Martin (Martin Lawrence) turns into a bust when his friends decide to boycott it. Gina: Tisha Campbell. Pam: Tichina Arnold. Tommy: Tommy Ford. Nipsey: Sean Lampkin. (repeat).

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: Gina and Pam star in a production of "Romeo and Juliet," in which Martin is suddenly cast as Romeo after he injures the male lead. James Earl Jackson: Roy Fegan. Pam: Tichina Arnold. (repeat).

programme.title: Martin
programme.desc: Martin and an injured Pam (Tichina Arnold) get lost during a hiking trip, leaving Gina and Tommy to search for them with a clueless ranger (Danny Breen). Tommy: Tommy Ford. Martin: Martin Lawrence. Gina: Tisha Campbell. (repeat).

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: A holiday visit from Will's taskmaster mother (Vernee Watson-Johnson) puts the kibosh on conspicuous consumption and puts the kids to work preparing Thanksgiving dinner. Ned: Jonathan Emerson. Will: Will Smith. (repeat).

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Will uses the knowledge that Hilary (Karyn Parsons) has dropped out of school to make her his personal gofer. Toni: Lisa Fuller. Kimmy: Sarah Buxton. Cindy: Beverly Jackson. Will: Will Smith. Philip: James Avery. (repeat).

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Carlton is surprised when freshman Will (Will Smith) carves a cozy niche for himself at Bel-Air Academy. Dr. Oates: James Tolkan. Kellogg: Michael Weiner. Fellows: Jonathan Emerson. Simon: Patrick Van Horn. (repeat).

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Boxing champ Evander Holyfield appears as one of the Banks' neighbors, some of whom object to Will's garish Christmas decorations. Reagan Impersonator: John Roarke. Vic: Taylor Negron. Will: Will Smith. (repeat).

programme.title: Booty Call
programme.desc: Farce revolving around the antics of sex-obsessed friends who are in need of some TLC from their dates.

programme.desc: In the Season 6 premiere, Remy Ma returns to the stage after more than six years behind bars; Peter finds himself in a sticky situation with Amina and Tara; Yandy and Mendeecees face an uncertain future; and young female artists battle for the top spot at DJ Self's Cypher. (repeat).

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Rich Dollaz welcomes a new lady into his home; Rah Ali and Yandy face difficulties with their artists; and Papoose warns Remy Ma about her wedding planner. Elsewhere, Amina confronts Tara about Peter's whereabouts, leading to an unlikely family reunion. (repeat).

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Cardi reveals something to Yorma at MariahLynn's birthday party; and Moe seeks advice from Yandy about Rah's management of BBOD. Later, Mendeecees prepares for his sentencing. (repeat).

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship forms when Mariah tells Cardi to make things right with Self. Elsewhere, Rich faces an unpleasant surprise from his daughter's mother; and Cisco is put in a predicament at BBOD's singles release party. (repeat).

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Yandy learns the next step of Mendeecees' legal case; Mariah receives devastating news; Cardi B and Bianca take etiquette training; and Amina reveals the fate of her pregnancy. Later, Lexxy threatens to leave BBOD for good. (repeat).

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop Atlanta
programme.desc: Sierra and Shooter's marital drama is put on pause by a death in the family. Dime takes a pregnancy test. Estelita gets the courage to confront Stevie. Tommie and Spice share a heart to heart. (repeat).

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
